description: Nasa project: hiện thực website sử dụng Nodejs ReactJS Sinh viên xem hướng dẫn về website tại link: https://hcmuteeduvn-my.sharepoint.com/personal/phunghx_ms_hcmute_edu_vn/_layouts/15/onedrive.aspx?id=%2Fpersonal%2Fphunghx%5Fms%5Fhcmute%5Fedu%5Fvn%2FDocuments%2FProjects%2Fvideos&ga=1

scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix client
